pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, September 2, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, September 2, 2017:

Whitehorse, Yukon

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister, accompanied by the Member of Parliament for Yukon, Larry Bagnell, and the Premier of Yukon, Sandy Silver, will make an announcement and hold a media availability.

Lookout on Schwatka Lake Road overlooking Grey Mountain and Miles Canyon

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.

Note: all times local
